# Environment & Setup

## Software Requirements

| Software | Version | Purpose |
|----------|---------|---------|
| Stata MP | {{version}} | Primary estimation |
| R | {{version}} | Secondary analysis, Quarto |
| Quarto | {{version}} | Documentation book |
| TeX Live | {{version}} | PDF compilation |

## File Paths

```
$RB = {{path to this project root}}
$OL = {{path to Overleaf project}}
```

## Reproduction Instructions

1. Install software above
2. Set paths in `code/paths.do` (Stata) or `scripts/config.R` (R)
3. Run `code/master_build_all.do` to rebuild all data and results
4. Run `quarto render` from `$RB/` to rebuild this book
